author: jstrachan
msg: minor change of API to expose configured endpoints as a List rather than Endpoint[] so that multiple types of endpoints can be configured in a typesafe way so they work nice with xbean - e.g. FileComponent can take 2 Endpoint[] properties for different kinds of endpoints
